name: Baby Banana Hemp Oatmeal Fingers
recipeIngredient: 1 small hunk banana, about 1/6 of a whole banana
1/4 cup soy, almond or coconut milk

recipeInstructions.text: First, get a cereal sized bowl out and mash the banana in it.
recipeInstructions.name: First, get a cereal sized bowl out and mash the banana in it.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the quick cooking oats, milk, hemp seeds and a sprinkle of cinnamon, if using. Mix well with a fork or spoon, scraping the sides down as good as you can.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the quick cooking oats, milk, hemp seeds and a sprinkle of cinnamon, if using. Mix well with a fork or spoon, scraping the sides down as good as you can.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the bowl in microwave and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the bowl in microwave and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Let sit for at least 5 minutes before cutting into about 4 "fingers". Make sure they are not too hot for baby, and serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Let sit for at least 5 minutes before cutting into about 4 "fingers". Make sure they are not too hot for baby, and serve!
